text: David Graham (11 July 1925) was an English character actor. He was known for his voice work for the series Doctor Who and Thunderbirds during the 1960s. He was also known for appearing as the villain in the one minute Apple Inc. advertisement "1984". ==Life and career== Graham was born on 11 July 1925 in London, he trained as an actor in New York City following service in the Royal Air Force as a radar mechanic, and worked mainly in British television.Peppa Pig and Thunderbirds actor David Graham dies ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1925 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors
title: David Graham
